sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY COMPONENT_ID ) rn , newtab.* FROM ( SELECT D.COMPONENT_ID COMPONENT_ID,D.NAME COMPONENT_NAME, C.SERVICE_ID SERVICE_ID,C.SERVICE_CN_NAME SERVICE_CN_NAME,A.TECH_IMPL_NAME TECH_IMPL_NAME, B.STATE STATE, G.COMM_PRO_CD COMM_PRO_CD,G.COMM_PRO_NAME COMM_PRO_NAME,B.CREATE_TIME CREATE_TIME,B.SER_TECH_IMPL_ID SER_TECH_IMPL_ID,A.TECH_IMPL_ID TECH_IMPL_ID, O.ORG_ID ORG_ID,O.NAME ORG_NAME, (SELECT ATTR_SPEC_VALUE FROM TECH_IMP_ATT T WHERE T.TECH_IMPL_ID = A.TECH_IMPL_ID AND T.ATTR_SPEC_ID = 2) OVERTIME, (SELECT ATTR_SPEC_VALUE FROM TECH_IMP_ATT T WHERE T.TECH_IMPL_ID = A.TECH_IMPL_ID AND T.ATTR_SPEC_ID = 1) CALL_URL FROM TECH_IMPL A, SER_TECH_IMPL B, SERVICE C, COMPONENT D, COMM_PROTOCAL G, ORG O WHERE A.TECH_IMPL_ID = B.TECH_IMPL_ID AND B.SERVICE_ID = C.SERVICE_ID AND A.COMPONENT_ID = D.COMPONENT_ID AND A.COMM_PRO_CD = G.COMM_PRO_CD AND D.ORG_ID = O.ORG_ID AND B.STATE = 'A'
A.COMPONENT_ID IN
#arrayComponentId[]#
B.SERVICE_ID IN
#arrayServiceId[]#
A.TECH_IMPL_NAME LIKE '%'||#techImplName#||'%'
) newtab ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #pro# AND #end#

SELECT COUNT(1) ALLNUM FROM TECH_IMPL A,SER_TECH_IMPL B,SERVICE C,COMPONENT D, COMM_PROTOCAL G,ORG O WHERE A.TECH_IMPL_ID = B.TECH_IMPL_ID AND B.SERVICE_ID = C.SERVICE_ID AND A.COMPONENT_ID = D.COMPONENT_ID AND A.COMM_PRO_CD = G.COMM_PRO_CD AND D.ORG_ID = O.ORG_ID AND B.STATE = 'A'
A.COMPONENT_ID IN
#arrayComponentId[]#
B.SERVICE_ID IN
#arrayServiceId[]#
A.TECH_IMPL_NAME LIKE '%'||#techImplName#||'%'

SELECT B.ATTR_SPEC_ID attrSpecId,B.ATTR_SPEC_NAME attrSpecName,NULLABLE nullable FROM TECH_IMP_ATTR_SPEC A,ATTR_SPEC B WHERE A.ATTR_SPEC_ID = B.ATTR_SPEC_ID and B.TENANT_ID=#tenantId#
A.COMM_PRO_CD = #commProCd#
ORDER BY attrSpecId

SELECT A.TECH_IMP_ATT_ID TECH_IMP_ATT_ID,A.ATTR_SPEC_ID ATTR_SPEC_ID,A.TECH_IMPL_ID TECH_IMPL_ID,A.ATTR_SPEC_VALUE ATTR_SPEC_VALUE,B.ATTR_SPEC_NAME ATTR_SPEC_NAME FROM TECH_IMP_ATT A,ATTR_SPEC B WHERE A.ATTR_SPEC_ID = B.ATTR_SPEC_ID and B.TENANT_ID=#tenantId#
A.TECH_IMPL_ID=#techImplId#
ORDER BY ATTR_SPEC_ID

SELECT COUNT(1) ALLNUM FROM TECH_IMPL A, COMPONENT D, COMM_PROTOCAL E, CTL_COUNTERMS_2_TECH G WHERE A.COMPONENT_ID = D.COMPONENT_ID AND A.COMM_PRO_CD = E.COMM_PRO_CD AND A.TECH_IMPL_ID = G.TECH_IMPL_ID
A.COMPONENT_ID IN
#arrayComponentId[]#
B.SERVICE_ID IN
#arrayServiceId[]#

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY TECH_IMPL_ID DESC ) rn , newtab.* FROM ( SELECT D.COMPONENT_ID COMPONENT_ID,D.NAME COMPONENT_NAME, A.TECH_IMPL_NAME TECH_IMPL_NAME, E.COMM_PRO_CD COMM_PRO_CD,E.COMM_PRO_NAME COMM_PRO_NAME, A.TECH_IMPL_ID TECH_IMPL_ID,G.CUTMS_VALUE CUTMS_VALUE,G.CYCLE_TYPE CYCLE_TYPE,G.CYCLE_VALUE CYCLE_VALUE,G.CC_CD CC_CD,F.NAME CC_NAME FROM TECH_IMPL A, COMPONENT D, COMM_PROTOCAL E, CTL_COUNTERMS_2_TECH G, CONTROL_COUNTERMS F WHERE A.COMPONENT_ID = D.COMPONENT_ID AND A.COMM_PRO_CD = E.COMM_PRO_CD AND A.TECH_IMPL_ID = G.TECH_IMPL_ID AND G.CC_CD = F.CC_CD
A.COMPONENT_ID IN
#arrayComponentId[]#
B.SERVICE_ID IN
#arrayServiceId[]#
) newtab ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #pro# AND #end#

SELECT C.SERVICE_ID , C.SERVICE_CN_NAME FROM COMPONENT A ,SER_INVOKE_INS B ,SERVICE C WHERE A.COMPONENT_ID = B.COMPONENT_ID AND B.SERVICE_ID = C.SERVICE_ID AND B.STATE = 'A' AND A.COMPONENT_ID = #componentId#

SELECT ORG_ID ORG_ID,ORGNAME ORGNAME,COMPONENT_ID COMPONENT_ID, tech_impl_id tech_impl_id,tech_impl_name tech_impl_name,code code,name name,comm_pro_cd comm_pro_cd,comm_pro_name comm_pro_name,usealbe_state usealbe_state,to_char(laest_time,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') laest_time FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RECNO, ORG_ID,ORGNAME,TECH_IMPL_ID,TECH_IMPL_NAME,COMPONENT_ID,NAME,CODE,comm_pro_cd,COMM_PRO_NAME,usealbe_state,laest_time FROM (select c.ORG_ID,c.NAME ORGNAME,a.TECH_IMPL_ID,a.TECH_IMPL_NAME,a.COMPONENT_ID,b.NAME,b.CODE,a.COMM_PRO_CD,d.COMM_PRO_NAME,a.USEALBE_STATE,a.LAEST_TIME from TECH_IMPL a,COMPONENT b ,org c,COMM_PROTOCAL d where a.component_id=b.component_id and b.ORG_ID=c.ORG_ID and a.COMM_PRO_CD = d.COMM_PRO_CD and a.TENANT_ID = #tenantId# AND b.TENANT_ID = #tenantId# AND c.TENANT_ID = #tenantId#
b.CODE=#componentCode# b.NAME like '%'||#componentName#||'%' b.org_id=#orgId# a.comm_pro_cd=#commProCd# a.tech_impl_name like '%'||#techImplName#||'%' a.USEALBE_STATE=#usealbeState#
ORDER BY TECH_IMPL_ID DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= (#startRow# + #rows# - 1) ) WHERE RECNO BETWEEN #startRow# AND (#startRow# + #rows# - 1)
select * from TECH_IMP_ATT a,ATTR_SPEC b where a.attr_spec_id=b.attr_spec_id and a.tech_impl_id=#TECH_IMPL_ID# and b.TENANT_ID=#tenantId#
sqlMap.delete: delete CTL_COUNTERMS_2_TECH a where a.TECH_IMPL_ID=#techImplId# and a.cc_cd=#cc_cd#
sqlMap.select: select * from TECH_IMP_ATTR_SPEC a ,ATTR_SPEC b where a.attr_spec_id=b.attr_spec_id and b.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and (a.comm_pro_type =2 or a.comm_pro_type is null) and a.comm_pro_cd=#commProCd# order by TECH_IMP_ATTR_SPEC_ID desc

select c.attr_spec_value,t.attr_spec_name,t.attr_spec_code,t.comm_pro_type,t.attr_spec_id from (select a.attr_spec_id,a.comm_pro_type,b.attr_spec_name,b.attr_spec_code from TECH_IMP_ATTR_SPEC a ,ATTR_SPEC b where a.attr_spec_id=b.attr_spec_id and b.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and (a.comm_pro_type=2 or a.comm_pro_type is null) and a.comm_pro_cd=#commProCd# order by TECH_IMP_ATTR_SPEC_ID desc ) t left join TECH_IMP_ATT c on t.attr_spec_id = c.attr_spec_id and c.tech_impl_id=#techImplId#
select distinct attr_spec_code from TECH_IMP_ATTR_SPEC a ,ATTR_SPEC b where a.attr_spec_id=b.attr_spec_id and b.TENANT_ID=#tenantId#

select ti.*, com.name comp_name, com.org_id, o.name org_name from tech_impl ti inner join component com on com.component_id = ti.component_id inner join org o on o.org_id = com.org_id where ti.tech_impl_id = #techImplId#
